KLA’s commitment to Advancing Humanity is deeply rooted in our shared 
values  which inform our approach to solving the world’s most challenging 
technological issues. By staying true to our values, we can advance 
humanity through innovation, stewardship, opportunity and leadership.

improvement. We keep driving innovation to advance the industry and
